DOC.brief_summary: Our aim is examine avenues by which mothers can transmit their trauma to their children.
DOC.detailed_description: The goal of the study is to test for genetic bases and Gene x Environment interactions on the development of difficulties, particularly stress disorders, in young children whose mother were exposed to terror before they were born.
DOC.criteria: Pregnant women who were exposed to terror in the last 5 years Matched Controls Does not speak Hebrew or English
